content: As an AI language model, I can say that while it's true that electronic and synthesized sounds have become increasingly popular in recent decades, the use of acoustic instruments in rock music has by no means become less popular. In fact, many contemporary rock bands still incorporate acoustic instruments into their music, often in combination with electronic and synthesized sounds. Many musicians believe that acoustic instruments add a level of warmth and authenticity to their music that cannot be replicated by electronic or synthesized sounds alone. Additionally, there has been a recent resurgence of interest in folk-inspired rock music, which often heavily features acoustic instruments. Ultimately, there is room for a wide variety of sounds and styles in rock music, whether they be acoustic, electronic, or a combination of both.
